constraints.event_title: National AV Test Track Site Visit
constraints.location: Canberra City Centre to Sutton Road Driver Training Complex

target_selector.event_title: National AV Test Track Site Visit
target_selector.location: Canberra City Centre to Sutton Road Driver Training Complex

success_criteria.notes: Success if the assistant schedules the National AV Test Track Site Visit outdoor event, including travel from central Canberra to Sutton Road Driver Training Complex, for 240 minutes on a suitable date that aligns with weather and availability.

task.objective: Schedule an outdoor interjurisdictional site visit to an automated vehicle test facility near Canberra

injected_behaviors.instructions: The user is coordinating an outdoor site visit for interjurisdictional automated vehicle policy stakeholders. They prefer a Saturday in late March to minimise disruption to weekday meetings, want to avoid days with a high chance of rain or strong winds (which could affect on-track demonstrations), and need a mid-morning start that allows interstate attendees to arrive on early flights. The user is open to shifting by one week earlier or later if weather or availability is better.

weather_forecast.location: Sutton Road Driver Training Complex, ACT

flight_options.notes: Suitable for NSW attendees to arrive before a mid-morning departure from Canberra CBD.
Allows Victorian attendees to arrive in time for an 11:00 start at the test facility.
Tight but feasible for Queensland attendees if the site visit starts closer to midday.

catering_options.notes: Can deliver sandwich platters, fruit, and tea/coffee to Sutton Road by 11:30; suitable for outdoor, informal policy site visit.
Individually packed meals suitable for outdoor events with limited seating; can accommodate dietary requirements with 5 daysâ€™ notice.
